column1: The Grubb Family was an important and wealthy family of the Shire-hobbits.
Female members of that family married into the Baggins Family and Boffin Family. Laura Grubb married Mungo Baggins
Some of the family were involved in auctioneering. The company Messrs Grubb
column2: Grubb and Burrowes was set to sell Bilbo Bagginss belongings.

column1: The name is meant to recall the English verb grub "dig
